testimonials.text: Mr Kent is a cheerful, engaging person who has potential for an excellent professional career in a range of business or technology-oriented areas. I have no hesitation in unreservedly supporting his application for work in your company.
testimonials.user: Dr. Vas Ponnambalam - University of Leeds

testimonials.text: I know Adam in the capacity of teaching him several computer science modules including Big Data Analytics. Adam has demonstrated his commitment to study and has a good attendance record, demonstrated excellent organisational skills, always handing in his well-written work on time or early. He has ability to solve any problems encountered quickly and effectively with or without supervision, he is also a friendly individual who is bright and motivated and always willing to learn and develop.
testimonials.user: Dr. Amen Bakhtiar - University of Liverpool
